Welcome to PracticalCoastalModel's documentation!
=================================================

* Prerequisites for the class
  
    Github

    linux/unix system

    script editting

    makefile

    HPC

* Basic skills

    Fortran

    MPI Parallelization

    Matlab/Python or other Graphic softwares

* Numerical schemes

* Theories  

* Coastal models

    Delft models: Delft3D Flow, SWAN, Sediment

    ADCIRC

    NearCOM

    FUNWAVE

    NHWAVE

    XBeach

    SWASH

    MONGOOSE

    OpenFORM
